command.text: declare @userName char(30), @o1 varchar(128), @o2 varchar(128) select @userName = name from vsysuserinfo where id = @@userID select @o1 = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_auth_url_nhdt' select @o2 = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_client_code_nhdt' select 'this._break = true;this._userName = ''' + rtrim(@userName) + ''';this._o1 = ''' + rtrim(@o1) + ''';this._o2 = ''' + rtrim(@o2) + '''' as message return
